      • setEnricher

        public EventBus.Builder setEnricher(EventEnricher enricher)
        Sets a custom Enricher for events posted to the EventBus which is being built.

        If the Enricher is not set, the enrichments will NOT be supported for the EventBus instance built.

        Parameters:
        enricher - the Enricher for events or null if enrichment is not supported

      • enricher

        public java.util.Optional<EventEnricher> enricher()

      • setLogLevelForPost

        public EventBus.Builder setLogLevelForPost(io.spine.grpc.LoggingObserver.Level level)
        Sets logging level for post operations.

        If not set directly, Level.TRACE will be used.

      • logLevelForPost

        public io.spine.grpc.LoggingObserver.Level logLevelForPost()
